oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ted Mack arrives at Berry Field and receives key to the City, Nashville, Tennessee, 1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Celebrity Ted Mack (center, 5th from left side) welcomed at the Nashville Airport circa 1950. Ted Mack (1904-1976) was born as William Edward Maguiness in Greeley, Colorado. He was the host of “Ted Mack and the Original Amateur Hour” on radio and television. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
